name: 1min.AI
description: 1min.AI is an all-in-one AI platform offering tools for text, image, audio, and video generation to streamline creative and professional tasks.
longDescription: 1min.AI is a versatile AI-powered platform designed to simplify access to multiple AI models for content creation, editing, and analysis. It integrates leading AI technologies like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and LLaMA to provide a unified interface for tasks such as text generation, image editing, and video production. The platform aims to save users time and money by eliminating the need for multiple subscriptions to individual AI tools. With an intuitive interface and a transparent credit system, 1min.AI caters to professionals, creators, and businesses seeking efficient, high-quality AI solutions. Its lifetime subscription and free credit options make it accessible for both casual and heavy users. The platform continuously evolves with weekly updates and a public roadmap for new features.
features: Chat with multiple AI assistants, including GPT, Claude, and Gemini, for interactive conversations and task assistance.
Generate high-quality images or edit existing ones with tools like background removal and image variation.
Create professional videos from text or static images in under a minute, ideal for social media and marketing.
Transcribe audio or generate voiceovers with natural-sounding AI voices for podcasts or presentations.
Perform document analysis and summarization to streamline research and content processing.
Write and optimize content, such as blog posts or marketing copy, with AI-driven text generation tools.
Translate documents and import prompts via CSV to bridge language barriers and enhance workflow efficiency.
Use the Magic Notebook feature to organize and store projects, tests, and plans across different tasks.
Access a transparent credit system to track usage and manage costs effectively for all AI features.
Integrate with the 1min.AI API to embed AI capabilities into custom applications or workflows.

faqs.question: What is 1min.AI?
faqs.answer: 1min.AI is an all-in-one AI platform that provides tools for text, image, audio, and video generation, powered by multiple AI models like ChatGPT and Claude.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, 1min.AI offers a free plan with limited usage and daily free credits (15,000) for visiting the web app.

faqs.question: How does the credit system work?
faqs.answer: Users spend credits on AI features, with unused credits carrying over to the next month and additional credits available for purchase.

faqs.question: Can I earn free credits?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can earn free credits by logging in daily (15,000 credits), leaving reviews (up to 12,000,000 credits), or referring friends (20,000 credits per referral).

faqs.question: What types of tasks can 1min.AI handle?
faqs.answer: 1min.AI supports tasks like content creation, image editing, video generation, audio transcription, and document analysis for various professional needs.

faqs.question: Is the platform suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, its intuitive interface makes it easy for beginners to use, while advanced features cater to experienced users.

faqs.question: Does 1min.AI offer a lifetime subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes, 1min.AI provides lifetime subscription plans, offering long-term value without recurring fees.

faqs.question: Can I use 1min.AI on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, 1min.AI is available on Android, with an iOS app in development, and supports web and Chrome extension access.

faqs.question: How often are new features added?
faqs.answer: 1min.AI updates weekly, with a public roadmap for users to track upcoming features and suggest improvements.

faqs.question: Is my data used to train AI models?
faqs.answer: No, 1min.AI ensures user data remains private and is not used for AI training.
